title: Yolov8n Image Segmentation
description: Compact and fast model for real-time image segmentation
long_description: YOLOv8n is a compact and fast model tailored for real-time instance segmentation, making it well-suited for edge devices like PSOC(tm) Edge. It strikes a balance between accuracy and performance by utilizing an optimized neural network backbone with low computational demands.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
